income_messages:
From: k********0@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-23 12:04:50
SUBJECT:   Good day
  Good day
I am writing this letter in confidence believing that if it is your
wish to help me,
I promise you that you will never ever regret helping me after hearing
my situation.
My name is Miss Rose Kunta, 19 years old. My father and my Mom with my
younger brother was involved in a ghastly motor accident.
My Mom and my younger brother died instantly, while my father later
died in the hospital while he was taking treatment.
Before his death, he told me that he deposited the sum of Three
Million, US Dollars with a Bank here.
I have succeeded in locating the bank and also confirmed the money is
in the account.
I want you to stand as my guardian and claim the money for me for
proper investment in your country,
so that i can come over there to continue with my education which i stopped.
I will surely compensate you after the transfer has been completed,
for your help and kindness to me.
I will be Waiting anxiously to hear from you.
Please reply me back here    
kuntarose0@gmail.com
Yours sincerely,
Rose.   
From: k********0@gmail.com
To: my90006@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 15:59:38
SUBJECT: Re: Good day, waiting for your response
I am writing to thank you for your reply,  Thank you also for your
acceptance to assist me get this money transfer to your account . I
promise you that you will never ever regret helping me as soon as
every thing is concluded.
The bank officer in charge of releasing my inheritance have promised
me that she will help as soon as i present a guardian which am very
happy to have you.
You will make arrangement for me to come over to your country to
continue with my education,  I’am assuring you that any help you
render to me will be much appreciated by me .
I will be going to the bank in other to inform them
about you for the transfer. I will like you to send me your telephone
number as well.
I am awaiting for your urgent respond.
Sincerely,
Rose
From: k********0@gmail.com
To: my90006@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 16:36:48
SUBJECT: Re: Good day, waiting for your response
Thank you for your respond. I don't ectaully know what you mean by the
dateline or more time?
I just want you to contact the bank so that they will instruct you on what
to do for the transfer.
Rose

To: my90006@m**************m

Thank you for your respond. This is why I want you to contact the bank so

tomorrow morning and ask for you on your behalf? Please let me know
Rose

I asked and they said before the money will be credited to you, you need to

Just try your possible best and help me
Rose

Roae

To: my90006@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-24 04:31:21
SUBJECT: Re: Good day, waiting for your response
I got your information here on internet when I was searching for reliable
and honest one who to help me. I prayed and believe with trust that you are
capable to help me.
I believe that you will not disappoint me now and in future. I believe that
my dream will be archive through you as soon as everything is concluded.
I am waiting to hear a good news from you now
Rose
From: k********0@gmail.com
To: my90006@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-24 09:28:46
SUBJECT: Re: Good day, waiting for your response
Thank you for hearing from you. I went to the bank this morning as I told
you, I met with the banker in charge. He told me everything that is needed.
There is need to get two necessary documents that will back up the
transfer. 1, transfer clearing certificate 2. Change of ownership right
documents. This two documents will only cost you US480.
Please I am begging you to try and send the money so that everything will
be concluded so that I will start planning to come over there .
Please, I really need your help here now. I am waiting to hear a good news
from you now
Rose

disappoint me. I know that we have not met but soon we will meet as soon as
everything is concluded.
I will really appreciate if you can assist me so that they will get the
documents so that the money will be transfer to you to enable me come over.
I am waiting to hear from you now
Rose
